meanings.definition: A type of small, two-masted merchant ship.
meanings.sent1: The bilanders sailed smoothly across the sea.
meanings.sent2: Many bilanders were seen at the busy port.
meanings.sent3: The bilanders had a race, but one ship kept going in circles!
meanings.sent4: The bilanders lined up like ducks in a row.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flags on the bilanders fluttered in the wind.

meanings.sent1: We saw two bilanders docked at the harbor.
meanings.sent2: The captain owned several bilanders for trade.
meanings.sent3: The bilanders gathered for a group photo, but they all looked the same!
meanings.sent4: The bilanders stood out in the sea of larger ships.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed from the bilanders.
